head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAHER, RICHARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAHER, RICHARD J.

block.p: MAHER-Richard J. Formerly of Eastchester, NY, on July 9, 2000. Husband of the late Rita J. Maher. Father of Peter D. Maher. Brother of Patricia Pello. Grandfather of Maureen, Peggy Anne, Kristina, Peter Jr., and John. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Tuesday. Mass of Christian Burial Holy Trinity Church, 213 W. 82 St, NYC, on Wednesday, July 12, at 10 AM.
